I concur with QuePensa. There is a video glitch at around 43:52. This occurs during the scene where Dumbo drinks the beer-tainted water. The glitch is small and does not affect the overall movie quality.

I have never heard of a FULL SCREEN 720p video file. After doing some quick research, it does appear that there is such a thing as a 720p movie in a full screen aspect ratio (4:3).

I cannot speak on the subtitle issue since I had no need to use it. Thank you uploader.
